title: Why am I not seeing any revenue, even with 100 impressions?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I use Unity Ads to generate revenue for my game.
  • I see that there are impressions reported, but no revenue for those impressions.

sections.title: Cause
content: It will take typically 5,000 impressions to determine the quality of users.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Typically it takes 5,000 impressions or more to determine the quality of the users you are sending. You will be getting revenue based on the quality of your users and the impressions you are showing.

sections.title: More Information
content: Revenue is generated based on a combination of views, clicks, and installs. There's no one unified way of pre-calculating the revenue generated by your game as we run a wide variety of campaigns on our platform. Over time, we optimize your game's ads to improve ad targeting and increase your revenue.
